animeTitle: Touch 3: Kimi ga Toorisugita Ato ni - Don't Pass Me By
otherNames: Touch 3: After You Passed By, タッチ３ 君が通り過ぎたあとに -DON`T PASS ME BY-
synopsis: Compilation movie of the third year of the Touch timeline. Contain many important plot differences, added scenes and the complete removal of an important character.
